name: Yortex's Day Off
description:
When Yortex isn't off on drunk adventures, he's apparently catching falling items! Try to catch as many items as possible without letting them hit the floor! Except for evil rubber ducks. Don't touch those. They're evil!

This was a fun little game to make for GAMES MADE QUICK??? FOUR while watching Summer Games Done Quick 2020! I found out I owned PICO-8 the day before the jam started and figured it would be fun to make a dumb little game starring my first DnD character, Yortex, with it!
